biotools.summary: Reproducible Epigenomics Analysis pipeline for the analysis of ChIP-Seq and RNA-Seq data using Docker images containing Galaxy and Jupyter. The analysis workflow was originally designed to analyze Brassica rapa data.

bioschemas.name: Epigenomics Workflow on Galaxy and Jupyter
bioschemas.summary: Reproducible Epigenomics Analysis pipeline for the analysis of ChIP-Seq and RNA-Seq data using Docker images containing Galaxy and Jupyter. The analysis workflow was originally designed to analyze Brassica rapa data.
